document_data.name: Maldridge House
document_data.mainbody: '''Maldridge House''' was a stately old mansion located on MacIntyre Path in [[Ravens Bluff]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. The mansion was best known as [[Jack Ravenwild]]'s temporary residence after he rescued [[Seila Norwood]] from [[slavery|enslavement]] by [[drow]] in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle||6}} The mansion burned to the ground that same year during a drow attempt to recapture Jack.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|3494|10}}
